translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の商いに何か？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anything about the deal just now?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……お前、前線に放り込んでも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... even if we throw you into the front lines,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金の話しかせんだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you'll only talk about money, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前……そんなに金貯めてどうするんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You... what are you going to do saving up so much money?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやはや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統はんからそんな事を聞かれるとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be asked something like that by the Supreme Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただの思いつきだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's just a fleeting idea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別にどうでもいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really care either way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあでも、確かにそうよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, that's true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 商売以外で、使ってる所もほとんど見た事ないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've hardly ever seen you use it for anything other than business.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んーー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プルーペットは表情を微動だにさせないまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pruppet didn't change his expression at all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し迷ったように指先で頭を掻いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and scratched his head with his fingertip, looking a bit unsure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、総統はんはお得意さんやし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, since the Supreme Commander is a valued customer,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しくらい、恥ずかしい話も披露しましょか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I guess I can share a slightly embarrassing story.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお。ま、暇潰しだ。さえずってみろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh? Well, it's a pastime. Go ahead and chirp away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ワテはまあ……育ちはポルトガルでんねんけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I… was raised in Portugal,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実は生まれた場所の記憶がありまへんのや
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I actually don't remember where I was born.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どこからか追放されたか、送り込まれたか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether I was banished from somewhere or sent here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 故郷の記憶は、霞ほどにしかありまへんねん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my memories of my hometown are just like a haze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんだと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「意外だすか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surprised?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……というか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... or rather,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガキなのか大人なのかも分からんから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't even tell if you're a kid or an adult,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 育ちと言われてもな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so when you say 'raised,' I'm not sure what you mean...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何言わはりまんねーん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you saying?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この額の大人毛。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Look at the adult hair on this forehead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっからどう見ても立派な成人でおま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No matter how you look at it, I'm a proper adult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………そうなのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Is that so?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっと。まあ、記憶あらしまへんから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh. Well, since I have no memories,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある程度は推量なんでっけどな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's mostly speculation to some extent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも今のみたいに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But sometimes, like just now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うっすら覚えとる事もあるんだす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I faintly remember things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワテと同じような姿をした同胞、緑豊かな森、丘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fellow beings that look like me, lush green forests, hills.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、幼馴染みの女のコと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And a childhood friend girl

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 平和に暮らしてたんどす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: living peacefully together.
Eh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんでも、別れの時が来た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But still, the time to part came.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワテが何かやらかしたのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether I did something wrong,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとも使命があったのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or it was because of some mission...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「記憶にあるんは、その幼馴染みの泣き顔だけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only memory I have is that childhood friend's tearful face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワテと別れ別れになって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We parted ways...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひたすら、ワテの名を呼ぶその子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she kept calling out my name.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戻るためには、金が要る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To return, money is needed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワテの意識の中に、強く擦り込まれてるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's deeply ingrained in my consciousness is only that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけですねんや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's all there is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつ戻れるのか。どれだけ貯めればいいのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I can return, how much I need to save.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へっ、まったく非効率な事ですねんけどな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh, it's a completely inefficient thing to do, though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そんな事情があったなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: T-To think you had such circumstances...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「可哀想です……お二人とも……うぅ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My heart goes out to both of you... sniff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「思ったより重たかったな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was heavier than I thought...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……やめておくんなはれ、湿っぽいのは……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Please stop with the sappiness...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 険しい銭の道に、目標があるって、幸せですやん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having a goal on this harsh path of money is happiness, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せやからワテは、笑っていこうって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why I say, let's keep smiling...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あー。盛り上がってるトコ悪いけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Uh. Sorry to interrupt the mood,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そいつ前に同じ事聞いたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but when I asked him the same thing before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 亡国の王子で国買い戻す言うとったで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he said he's a prince of a fallen country and plans to buy back his nation.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anything about the deal just now?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……お前、前線に放り込んでも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... even if we throw you into the front lines,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金の話しかせんだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you'll only talk about money, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前……そんなに金貯めてどうするんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You... what are you going to do saving up so much money?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやはや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統はんからそんな事を聞かれるとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be asked something like that by the Supreme Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただの思いつきだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's just a fleeting idea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別にどうでもいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really care either way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあでも、確かにそうよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, that's true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 商売以外で、使ってる所もほとんど見た事ないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've hardly ever seen you use it for anything other than business.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んーー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プルーペットは表情を微動だにさせないまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pruppet didn't change his expression at all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し迷ったように指先で頭を掻いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and scratched his head with his fingertip, looking a bit unsure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、総統はんはお得意さんやし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, since the Supreme Commander is a valued customer,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しくらい、恥ずかしい話も披露しましょか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I guess I can share a slightly embarrassing story.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお。ま、暇潰しだ。さえずってみろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh? Well, it's a pastime. Go ahead and chirp away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ワテはまあ……育ちはポルトガルでんねんけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I… was raised in Portugal,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実は生まれた場所の記憶がありまへんのや
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I actually don't remember where I was born.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どこからか追放されたか、送り込まれたか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether I was banished from somewhere or sent here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 故郷の記憶は、霞ほどにしかありまへんねん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my memories of my hometown are just like a haze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんだと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「意外だすか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surprised?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……というか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... or rather,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガキなのか大人なのかも分からんから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't even tell if you're a kid or an adult,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 育ちと言われてもな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so when you say 'raised,' I'm not sure what you mean...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何言わはりまんねーん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you saying?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この額の大人毛。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Look at the adult hair on this forehead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっからどう見ても立派な成人でおま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No matter how you look at it, I'm a proper adult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………そうなのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Is that so?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっと。まあ、記憶あらしまへんから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh. Well, since I have no memories,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある程度は推量なんでっけどな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's mostly speculation to some extent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも今のみたいに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But sometimes, like just now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うっすら覚えとる事もあるんだす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I faintly remember things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワテと同じような姿をした同胞、緑豊かな森、丘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fellow beings that look like me, lush green forests, hills.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、幼馴染みの女のコと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And a childhood friend girl

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 平和に暮らしてたんどす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: living peacefully together.
Eh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんでも、別れの時が来た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But still, the time to part came.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワテが何かやらかしたのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether I did something wrong,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとも使命があったのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or it was because of some mission...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「記憶にあるんは、その幼馴染みの泣き顔だけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only memory I have is that childhood friend's tearful face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワテと別れ別れになって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We parted ways...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひたすら、ワテの名を呼ぶその子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she kept calling out my name.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戻るためには、金が要る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To return, money is needed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワテの意識の中に、強く擦り込まれてるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's deeply ingrained in my consciousness is only that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけですねんや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's all there is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつ戻れるのか。どれだけ貯めればいいのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I can return, how much I need to save.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へっ、まったく非効率な事ですねんけどな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh, it's a completely inefficient thing to do, though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そんな事情があったなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: T-To think you had such circumstances...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「可哀想です……お二人とも……うぅ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My heart goes out to both of you... sniff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「思ったより重たかったな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was heavier than I thought...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……やめておくんなはれ、湿っぽいのは……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Please stop with the sappiness...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 険しい銭の道に、目標があるって、幸せですやん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having a goal on this harsh path of money is happiness, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せやからワテは、笑っていこうって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why I say, let's keep smiling...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あー。盛り上がってるトコ悪いけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Uh. Sorry to interrupt the mood,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そいつ前に同じ事聞いたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but when I asked him the same thing before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 亡国の王子で国買い戻す言うとったで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he said he's a prince of a fallen country and plans to buy back his nation.
